name: webmaster/maxmind-db-reader
description: This is the MaxMind DB Reader for Hyperf or other resident process framework. It preloads the entire mmdb file into memory, with the memory usage equal to the size of the mmdb file. It has no disk IO operations and maintains query efficiency at the microsecond level.

suggest.ext-bcmath: bcmath or gmp is required for decoding larger integers with the pure PHP decoder
suggest.ext-gmp: bcmath or gmp is required for decoding larger integers with the pure PHP decoder
suggest.ext-maxminddb: A C-based database decoder that provides significantly faster lookups
